name: MySontheDungeonMaster
0:
”Alexa, ask the dungeon master what would Derf Longbottom do”
”Alexa, ask the dungeon master to do a perception check. I rolled a 14”
”Alexa,ask The dungeon master to play the latest episode”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the dungeon master
des:
What would Derf do? Tells you what Derf would do.
What would Marliss do? Tells you what Marliss would do.
Ask about the cast. This will tell you trivia about the cast.
Do a Skill Check. Play a game to say who wins between you and the dungeon master.
Play the podcast. Plays the latest episode.
Play something fun. This will play a thirty second clip from the podcast.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
